attributes.review: took me 20 min to download just to keep crashing😩 pretty pointless and unnecessary app too but okay. DO NOT get this app please please don’t waste your time and energy on this i highly recommend getting literally any other app. this app is not it✨💕
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This app is so horrible I downloaded it to see what’s so good about trump but he hasn’t built the wall that he supposedly said he was gonna do he insulted the colored people he is racist and he took away our money there is no reward on for this app or for him to be president
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app was not beneficial and was very revolting. my eyes will never be the same after my experience with this app it has scarred me and my whole family. I’m truly sorry to anyone who have experienced what I have on this app. 😭
attributes.title: Do not recommend  at all 👎

attributes.review: This app was very terrible. I have good wifi but the app continually lagged out. I found a lot of grammatical errors. I gained no real good information from this app & nobody should be voting for this ignorant racist president in the election anyways. This app should be taken down from the app store IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: This is literally the worst app that I have ever come across. Not only is this man dirty but so is this app. This app should be removed for the app store immediately. They want to band TikTok so bad, when in reality this app is so much worse. Apple, please remove this app for the sake of our children and this generation.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see reasons why I should vote for trump but I don’t think this app is private enough, it’s hard to explain but I feel like when I signed up for this app the government took all my information.
attributes.title: Ace’s review

attributes.review: I can’t even put into words how disappointed I am. This app started glitching as soon as I downloaded it. Showing flashing images ending in my goldfish getting a seizure and dying. The creators of this app will hear from my lawyers. #Justiceforgoldie
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: This was the worst app ever!!! Have u ever went inside an app and instantly felt like u were in a racist environment? Well this app is the place to experience that discomfort. I was honestly very disappointed in this app and in our president. Well everyone go out and vote in November.
attributes.title: Hated ever minute of this app

attributes.review: I’m so mad I downloaded the app and it immediately cause my phone to crash and my phone has never done this before its basically brand new. It glitches out my phone so much for no reason. along side the fact that trump is racist and disgusting
attributes.title: WARNING THIS APP GLITCHED MY PHONE

attributes.review: This app is so bad causes so many glitches and I don’t wanna get a new phone or get it fixed and I don’t really trust it and feel like there looking through my info but that’s just me.
attributes.title: If no star was an option I would do it
